page.title: 03Middlefield Hosp.-training
page.content: The{patients}are trained to be self-sufficient and to learn skills such as wood and metal work and to cater for themselves. There are voluntary groups that come in and teach and entertain the patients and there is a{training centre to which the patients go. They are taught the safety precations about living alone and how to escape from a fire.They are taught how to use a cooker and how to cook. There is an automatic fire alarm that is connected to the fire station.Most patients would know what to do in case of fire,but others would need help. There are regular fire drills so that the patients know what to do.They have events every year such as the summer fayre.They have weekly papers and bulletin that you can get free.
